amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change and infrastructure.

vote.text: Amendment SA 115, under the order of 1/17/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 38.

action.text: Amendment SA 115 proposed by Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S526-527; text: CR S526) To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change and infrastructure.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 115, under the order of 1/17/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 38.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 115, under the order of 1/17/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 38.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 115 proposed by Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2.
